Name: Pear & Vanilla Rickey
Ingredients: 30 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
TOP with lemonade and briefly stir.
Garnish with lime wedge on rim.
Review: Vanilla and pear create a creamy vanilla mouthful cut by lime juice.
Nutrition: One serving of Pear & Vanilla Rickey contains 143 calories
